nodes.title: Samsung Electronics
nodes.short_description: Largest memory competitor; sets pricing, capacity, and technology pace in DRAM/NAND.

nodes.title: NVIDIA
nodes.short_description: Major HBM customer; AI demand drives SK hynix shipments and capacity decisions.

nodes.title: ASML
nodes.short_description: Sole EUV lithography supplier; tool access dictates SK hynix process scaling.

nodes.title: Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Company (TSMC)
nodes.short_description: CoWoS packaging bottleneck affects HBM module integration for NVIDIA platforms.

nodes.title: Micron Technology
nodes.short_description: Key DRAM/NAND rival; China ban shifted some demand to SK hynix.

nodes.title: High Bandwidth Memory (HBM3/HBM3E)
nodes.short_description: Flagship high-margin product for AI accelerators; capacity and yields crucial.

nodes.title: DRAM
nodes.short_description: Core revenue driver; pricing cycles determine profitability.

nodes.title: NAND Flash Memory
nodes.short_description: Storage product segment; impacted by pricing, capex, and demand cycles.

nodes.title: Artificial Intelligence and Data Center Computing
nodes.short_description: Primary growth engine; dictates HBM demand and long-term investments.

nodes.title: Smartphone Manufacturing
nodes.short_description: Major end market; drives mobile DRAM and NAND demand.

nodes.title: U.S. semiconductor export controls on China (2022â€“present)
nodes.short_description: Restrict advanced tools and chips; waivers critical for SK hynix China fabs.

nodes.title: Japan's 2019 export restrictions on semiconductor materials to South Korea
nodes.short_description: Tightened photoresist and HF exports; forced supply chain adjustments.

nodes.title: China's ban on Micron in critical infrastructure (2013)
nodes.short_description: Shifted some Chinese memory demand toward rivals, including SK hynix.

nodes.title: United States
nodes.short_description: Key market, customer base, and policymaker affecting subsidies and export rules.

nodes.title: China
nodes.short_description: Large market and manufacturing base; subject to export controls impacting operations.
